entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 after midnight then light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
